content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='pass@colg123'
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL cred_raj
WITH 
    IDENTITY ='Managed Identity'

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE gold_prime
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'https://azprimework.blob.core.windows.net/gold/',
    CREDENTIAL = cred_raj
)
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT format_parquet
WITH
(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.snappyCodes'
)
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.extprime
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'extprime',
    DATA_SOURCE =source_gold,
    FILE_FORMAT = format_parquet
)
AS
SELECT * FROM gold.extprime
SELECT * FROM gold.prime1
